name: Stick Rich
description:
In this guessing puzzle game, you must find the stick and collect your score. It may sound easy, but will require focus and concentration or luck.

It is fun! Download and play it. We dare you, how much can you get the scores?

Features:
- 100 unique levels.
- High Scores.
- Music and soundtracks.
- iPod library access to play your favorite tracks while playing the game.
